title: The Majestic Gray Wolf
description: The Gray Wolf is a canid known for its powerful howl and a complex social structure. They live and hunt in packs and are apex predators in their ecosystems.

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of wolves?
What is the primary purpose of a wolf's howl?
Which of these is the most common prey for a gray wolf?
How do wolves establish a social hierarchy in their pack?
options: By respecting a single dominant pair
By leaving the pack when they get older
questions.correct_answer: By respecting a single dominant pair

questions.question: What is a unique characteristic of a wolf's sense of smell?
options: It is 100 times stronger than a human's
It is 500 times stronger than a human's
It is 1,000 times stronger than a human's
It is 10,000 times stronger than a human's
questions.correct_answer: It is 100 times stronger than a human's
